title.narrative: Support to the UNSG High-Level Panel on Internal Displacement 2020-2021

description.narrative: The objective of the grant is to support work of the UN High-Level Panel on Internal Displacement through to its completion end of 2021. The objective of the grant is to support work of the UN High-Level Panel on Internal Displacement through to its completion end of 2021. The Panel has been tasked by the UN Secretary-General to identify innovative actions for concrete solutions and tangible changes on the ground across the spectrum of internal displacement caused by armed conflict, generalized violence, human rights violations, natural disasters and the adverse effects of climate change.
The grant will support a report by the UN High Level Panel on Internal Displacement with concrete and practical recommendations to Member States, the United Nations system, and other relevant stakeholders on how to better respond to internal displacement and achieve government-led durable solutions. The panel will further focus on five focus areas listed below.
For more information please visit: https://www.un.org/internal-displacement-panel/
